mapper.select: SELECT report_no reportNo, member_name memberName, report_member_name reportMemberName, question_no questionNo, question_comment_no questionCommentNo, answer_no answerNo, answer_comment_no answerCommentNo, report_kind reportKind, report_title reportTitle, report_content reportContent, report_date reportDate, report_state reportState FROM dev_report WHERE report_title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND report_kind like CONCAT('%',#{reportKind},'%') ORDER BY report_state, report_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dev_report WHERE report_title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') AND report_kind like CONCAT('%',#{reportKind},'%')

SELECT report_no reportNo, member_name memberName, report_member_name reportMemberName, question_no questionNo, question_comment_no questionCommentNo, answer_no answerNo, answer_comment_no answerCommentNo, report_kind reportKind, report_title reportTitle, report_content reportContent, report_date reportDate, report_state reportState FROM dev_report WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}
